snippet: Shares in India's Infosys Ltd fell 3 percent in pre-open trading on Monday following reports that some of its founders were selling shares in the software services exporter worth $1.1 billion....

headline.print_headline: India's Infosys Shares Fall 3 Percent as Founders Said to Sell Shares
headline.main: India's Infosys Shares Fall 3 Percent as Founders Said to Sell Shares

lead_paragraph: Shares in India's Infosys Ltd fell 3 percent in pre-open trading on Monday following reports that some of its founders were selling shares in the software services exporter worth $1.1 billion.
